title: The Reincarnated Girl Is Free Once Again! - Novel Updates
tags: Carefree Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation
author: 凛堂なつめ
description:
When I wake up from an unreasonable death…… I’ve been reincarnated in a different world where magic exists!

It’s not just that she’s cute, but she’s smart, good at sports, and even has magic that’s out of this world!

The girl who was reincarnated as the daughter of an aristocrat with super specs, however, she does not want to be a noble, and is enjoying a free and easily life spoiled by the people around her with a smile today.

Where is she going? What will she do?>
